data.title: Electrician Near Me 80907 - Front Range Electric, Inc.
data.meta_description: Did you buy an older home, finished building, or remodel? Contact the electricians of Front Range Electric in Colorado Springs! We offer free consultations!
data.text:
The electricians of Front Range Electric are vigilant on keeping up-to-date on building code and safety updates in Colorado Springs. All of our work is performed by certified electricians who are serious about building code compliance and keeping your home and your family safe. If you’re looking for an inspection of your electrical system, let us evaluate and recommend upgrades for compliance.

The Importance of Building Codes

Whether you’ve just bought a home in Colorado Springs and need to know if your electrical work needs updating, you’ve finished a remodel, or you’ve finished building a home, it’s incredibly important to get your electrical work up to building code standards in Colorado Springs. Building code speaks to building best practices, as well as safety standards. Having your home building code compliant may eliminate the risk of catastrophic events that could damage your home, such as fire, and may help your home run at its most efficient.

Building Code & Front Range Electric

The electricians of Front Range Electric in Colorado Springs would love to help take the confusion out of building code and help you know how to have your home building code compliant. Most importantly, our electricians would like to give you peace of mind knowing that you and your family are safe.

Electrical Services We Offer

The electricians at Front Range Electric can help you with building code compliance and related issues, as well as many other services. Other electrical services Front Range Electric offers to our Colorado Springs clients include:
